<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Merciful Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=111) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Additive 2" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=4" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 79 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per round

**Trigger**
You craft an [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) using Quick Alchemy, and that elixir is at least 2 levels lower than your advanced alchemy level.

</column>

---

You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker's body and mind. The elixir of life attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) one fear effect or one effect imposing the [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) condition on the drinker, using the item's level and a counteract modifier equal to your class DC – 10.

<title level="2">Merciful Elixir leads to...</title>
[Greater Merciful Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=117)
name: Merciful Elixir
